Hunters.Name: The Mercenary
Hunters.Description: An old Mercenary which wants to kill all Runners for killing his father during the first Bloodgames

Hunters.Name: Speed

Hunters.Name: Eye
Hunters.Description: A Titan who sees everything. No one can't hide from her sight.
